Package com.datumbox.framework.machinelearning.common.bases.basemodels

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseBoostingBagging<MP extends BaseBoostingBagging.ModelParameters,TP extends BaseBoostingBagging.TrainingParameters,VM extends BaseBoostingBagging.ValidationMetrics>
    Base class for Adaboost and BoostrapAgregating.
    BaseBoostingBagging.ModelParameters
    The ModelParameters class stores the coefficients that were learned during the training of the algorithm.
    BaseBoostingBagging.TrainingParameters
    The TrainingParameters class stores the parameters that can be changed before training the algorithm.
    BaseBoostingBagging.ValidationMetrics
    The ValidationMetrics class stores information about the performance of the algorithm.
    BaseDPMM<CL extends BaseDPMM.Cluster,MP extends BaseDPMM.ModelParameters,TP extends BaseDPMM.TrainingParameters,VM extends BaseDPMM.ValidationMetrics>
    Base class for Dirichlet Process Mixtures Models.
    BaseDPMM.Cluster
    Base class for the Cluster class of the DPMM.
    BaseDPMM.ModelParameters<CL extends BaseDPMM.Cluster>
    Base class for the Model Parameters of the algorithm.
    BaseDPMM.TrainingParameters
    Base class for the Training Parameters of the algorithm.
    BaseDPMM.ValidationMetrics
    Base class for the Validation Parameters of the algorithm.
    BaseLinearRegression<MP extends BaseLinearRegression.ModelParameters,TP extends BaseLinearRegression.TrainingParameters,VM extends BaseLinearRegression.ValidationMetrics>
    Base class for Linear Regression Models.
    BaseLinearRegression.ModelParameters
    Base class for the Model Parameters of the algorithm.
    BaseLinearRegression.TrainingParameters
    Base class for the Training Parameters of the algorithm.
    BaseLinearRegression.ValidationMetrics
    Base class for the Validation Parameters of the algorithm.
    BaseNaiveBayes<MP extends BaseNaiveBayes.ModelParameters,TP extends BaseNaiveBayes.TrainingParameters,VM extends BaseNaiveBayes.ValidationMetrics>
    Base class for Naive Bayes Models.
    BaseNaiveBayes.ModelParameters
    Base class for the Model Parameters of the algorithm.
    BaseNaiveBayes.TrainingParameters
    Base class for the Training Parameters of the algorithm.
    BaseNaiveBayes.ValidationMetrics
    Base class for the Validation Parameters of the algorithm.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description

    The status of the weight estimation process.
